name: Super Growth Magical Girl
description:
Become the SuGoii Magi in this 2D top-down shooter called SuperGrowth MagicalGirl. Shoot, explode and upgrade your way through an endless horde of eyeball monster, level up by collecting the dropped yellow experience crystals, and see how high you can score!

Controls:

MOUSE: aim/click upgrades

WASD: move

Music credit: Darren Curtis
